summary: Set in 19th Century Canada, Brigette and her sister Ginger take refuge in a Traders' Fort which later becomes under siege by some savage werewolves.
cast: Katharine Isabelle|Emily Perkins|Nathaniel Arcand|JR Bourne|Hugh Dillon|Adrien Dorval|Brendan Fletcher|David La Haye|Tom McCamus|Matthew Walker|Fabian Bird|Kirk Jarrett|David MacInnis|Stevie Mitchell|Edna Rain|Jake McKinnon
title: Ginger Snaps III: El origen
